content.html: I will from now on ask every man I work with "so what are your long-term plans, do you plan to stay employed, advance your career, or are you more family oriented" It really does imply that if you have to take time off for childcare, you cannot have a career
content.value:
I will from now on ask every man I work with "so what are your long-term plans, do you plan to stay employed, advance your career, or are you more family oriented"

It really does imply that if you have to take time off for childcare, you cannot have a career
